Message:
Born with weak legs,
I spent much of
my early life stuck
within the walls of
my home.

Feeling sorry for my plight,
one day, my father brought
an esteemed harp player
home with him.

That moment would change
the course of my life forever...

The moment I heard
the reverberating hum
of the harp’s strings,
the walls around me
seemed to change.

The fresh scent of sunlit earth
and the trill of birdsong...

Through its melody,
the harp gave me a glimpse
of the outside world.

This is the power of music.
A rhapsody of dreams,
giving color to a dull world...

Someday, I, too, want to
make a sound just like that...!
